I am a research assistant at the chair of [Empirical Economics](https://www2.wiwi.rub.de/en/chairs/empirische-wirtschaftsforschung-en/){target="_blank"} at Ruhr University Bochum and doctoral researcher in the [RTG Regional Disparities and Economic Policy](https://www.regional-disparities.de/){target="_blank"}. My research interests include transport economics, environmental economics, as well as regional and urban economics.

In particular, my research so far has focused on

-   Vehicle registration taxes
-   Public transport subsidies
-   Rail infrastructure expansion
-   Car ownership and mobility behavior

You can find out more about my projects [here](research.qmd).
